text: Caroline Cellier (7 August 1945 - 15 December 2020) was a French actress. She was born in Montpellier, France. Her career lasted from 1964 to 2011. She was known for her roles in This Man Must Die, L'emmerdeur and A Thousand Billion Dollars. From 1978 to 1992, Cellier was married to actor Jean Poiret. They had one child. Cellier died on 15 December 2020 at the age of 75.L’actrice Caroline Cellier, connue pour ses seconds rôles, est décédée à 75 ans ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors
title: Caroline Cellier
